comments:
Build 20020521

While restarting a test workspace in self-hosted mode, I observed the following 
logging, even though I had exited this workspace properly before.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 567 May 28, 2002 12:55:17.240
!MESSAGE Problems occurred while restoring the workspace.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 567 May 28, 2002 12:55:17.240
!MESSAGE Could not read metadata for: 
D:/eclipse/testing/dev2/plugins/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.core.resources/.p
rojects/org.eclipse.jdt.ui/.syncinfo.
!STACK 0

Closing.  We won't be able to figure out why the file was corrupt without
reproducible steps.  In the 2.1 timeframe we made improvements so that
corruption in sync info files will not prevent workspaces from starting.
